author: Sharon_traveller2014
title: Hotel accommodation review - Premier Inn London City Tower Hill
text: I recently stayed at the Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel for the first time for one evening. It was an enjoyable stay at this hotel the room was quiet and comfortable. Great value for money and the hotel is in an excellent location close to shops and public transport. I would recommend this hotel as it met all my needs.
